data.message: I want to hear some Shady stuff. Rap not hip hop. 1990s rap is always going to be the shit. Go back to your roots M

replies.message: You know he cant, he's not that person anymore. He's different and his reasons for rapping are different. Back then he was on some awful drugs, trying to hold a family together, and dealing with other major personal shit. You would want him to go through all that again just to make raps that you enjoyed? Selfish and have no understanding of the world.
That's just being a fan Elizabeth Wofford !!!

Wow. If u like this auto tuned and saying the same shit over and over then enjoy. I will stick to my drug dealing and major shit than listen to these studio gangsters. Sorry my opinion made u mad. Playin I could care less what u think. Live on these streets and see the shit I have and then u can say something  haha
Eminem doesn't use auto tune nor does he act gangster. If anything, before he did.
What are you talking about? hip-hop is the real shit
